title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-2.21 - Food sample demonstrations and food promotions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-2.21 - Food sample demonstrations and food promotions

State Regulations

When food sample demonstrations and food promotions are
authorized in the retail food store, the person in charge shall ensure that
such activities comply with the applicable sanitation provisions of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-2.21

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
